thread.title: Chelsea transfer news: Paulo Dybala reveals he is on verge of new deal | Metro News
thread.title_full: Chelsea transfer news: Paulo Dybala reveals he is on verge of new deal | Metro News

author: Coral Barry For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Chelsea transfer news: Paulo Dybala reveals he is on verge of new deal | Metro News
text:
Coral Barry for Metro.co.uk Thursday 16 Feb 2017 10:43 am Paulo Dybala is on the verge of signing a new deal (Picture: Getty) 
Paulo Dybala has revealed he is close to signing a new long-term deal at Juventus. ‘How can Gibbs be captain?!’ Man Utd legend Roy Keane TEARS into Arsenal flops 
The 23-year-old has blossomed into one of the best attackers in Europe in his time at Juventus, attracting the attentions of top clubs elsewhere. 
Barcelona and Real Madrid have heavily been linked with a transfer for Dybala as has Premier League clubs Chelsea and Manchester United. 
But Dybala has virtually ended hope of a summer switch by saying he is on the verge of putting pen to paper on a new deal. 
‘We are very close to the renewal and there is very little missing,’ Dybala told Sky Italia. Chelsea fixtures 
Swansea (H) – Sat 25 Feb West Ham (A) – Mon 6 Mar Watford (H) – Mon 13 Mar Stoke (A) – Sat 18 Mar Crystal Palace (H) – Sat 1 Apr Manchester City (H) – Wed 5 Apr Bournemouth (A) – Sat 8 Apr Manchester United (A) – Sat 15 Apr 
‘My agent will come to Italy to talk about the last things with [Juventus general manager Giuseppe] Marotta, but the will is there on our part.’ 
Chelsea boss Antonio Conte has an excellent relationship with Juventus after three trophy-laden years at the club as manager. Dybala has scored eight goals in all competitions this season (Picture: Getty)
